data:
* Features:
	+ Gamification of learning process
	+ Mobile application version
	+ Multi-language support
	+ Integration with existing company LMS (Learning Management System)
	+ Virtual reality simulations
	+ Offline access to content
	+ User feedback collection
	+ Discussion forums for users
	+ Personalized recommendations for further learning
	+ Integration with wearable devices for real-time safety monitoring
	+ Analytics for individual user performance
	+ Integration with HR systems for automatic record-keeping
	+ Customizable branding for individual companies
	+ Automated notifications for training deadlines
	+ Integration with performance review systems
	+ Advanced reporting and analytics for management
	+ API for integration with third-party systems
	+ Advanced AI-based content generation
	+ Integration with safety equipment vendors for product recommendations
	+ Integration with emergency response systems for real-time alerts
	+ Integration with government safety databases for up-to-date regulations
	+ Integration with emergency response systems for real-time alerts
	+ Customizable compliance reports for management
	+ Integration with background check systems for worker eligibility
	+ Integration with safety audit systems for automated reporting
	+ Integration with safety inspection systems for automated scheduling
	+ Integration with safety incident reporting systems for automated analysis
	+ Integration with safety culture surveys for continuous improvement
